snippet: Owners of an American team have reached an agreement to launch the China American Football League, which is expected to begin in 2015.
abstract: Marty Judge, co-owner of Philadelphia Soul of the Arena Football League, says he has reached agreement with Chinese authorities to launch the China American Football League in conjunction with the Chinese Rugby Football Assn; expects it to start in Aug 2015 with six to eight teams.
lead_paragraph: Owners of an American team have reached an agreement to launch the China American Football League, which is expected to begin in 2015.

headline.main: Arena Football Is Crossing Into New Territory: China
headline.print_headline: Taking Arena Sport to New Territory: China
